verses.verse: But now <S%H6258><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that created <S%H1254><s%> thee, O Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and he that formed <S%H3335><s%> thee, O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have redeemed <S%H1350><s%> thee, I have called <S%H7121><s%> thee by thy name; <S%H8034><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art mine.

When <S%H3588><s%> thou passest through <S%H5674><s%> the waters, <S%H4325><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will be with <S%H854><s%> thee; and through the rivers, <S%H5104><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> overflow <S%H7857><s%> thee: when <S%H3588><s%> thou walkest <S%H1980><s%> through <S%H1119><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be burned; <S%H3554><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the flame <S%H3852><s%> kindle <S%H1197><s%> upon thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thy Savior: <S%H3467><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for thy ransom, <S%H3724><s%> Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> thee.

Since <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> thou wast precious <S%H3365><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> thou hast been honorable, <S%H3513><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> have loved <S%H157><s%> thee: therefore will I give <S%H5414><s%> men <S%H120><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> thee, and people <S%H3816><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> thy life. <S%H5315><s%>

Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am with <S%H854><s%> thee: I will bring <S%H935><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> from the east, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4217><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> thee from the west; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4628><s%>

I will say <S%H559><s%> to the north, <S%H6828><s%> Give up; <S%H5414><s%> and to the south, <S%H8486><s%> Keep not back: <S%H3607><s%> <S%H408><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> my sons <S%H1121><s%> from far, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> and my daughters <S%H1323><s%> from the ends <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

Even every one <S%H3605><s%> that is called <S%H7121><s%> by my name: <S%H8034><s%> for I have created <S%H1254><s%> him for my glory, <S%H3519><s%> I have formed <S%H3335><s%> him; yea, <S%H637><s%> I have made <S%H6213><s%> him.
Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the blind <S%H5787><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> that have <S%H3426><s%> eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and the deaf <S%H2795><s%> that have ears. <S%H241><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> be gathered <S%H6908><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and let the people <S%H3816><s%> be assembled: <S%H622><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> among them can declare <S%H5046><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> and show <S%H8085><s%> us former things? <S%H7223><s%> let them bring forth <S%H5414><s%> their witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> that they may be justified: <S%H6663><s%> or let them hear, <S%H8085><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> It is truth. <S%H571><s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> are my witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and my servant <S%H5650><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have chosen: <S%H977><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may know <S%H3045><s%> and believe <S%H539><s%> me, and understand <S%H995><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am he: <S%H1931><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me there was no <S%H3808><s%> God <S%H410><s%> formed, <S%H3335><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me.
I, <S%H595><s%> even I, <S%H595><s%> am the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1107><s%> me there is no <S%H369><s%> savior. <S%H3467><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> have declared, <S%H5046><s%> and have saved, <S%H3467><s%> and I have showed, <S%H8085><s%> when there was no <S%H369><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> god among you: therefore ye <S%H859><s%> are my witnesses, <S%H5707><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I <S%H589><s%> am God. <S%H410><s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> before the day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> was I <S%H589><s%> am he; <S%H1931><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> that can deliver <S%H5337><s%> out of my hand: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> I will work, <S%H6466><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> shall let <S%H7725><s%> it?

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> your redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> For your sake <S%H4616><s%> I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and have brought down <S%H3381><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their nobles, <S%H1281><s%> and the Chaldeans, <S%H3778><s%> whose cry <S%H7440><s%> is in the ships. <S%H591><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> your Holy One, <S%H6918><s%> the creator <S%H1254><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your King. <S%H4428><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which maketh <S%H5414><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and a path <S%H5410><s%> in the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%>

Which bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> the chariot <S%H7393><s%> and horse, <S%H5483><s%> the army <S%H2428><s%> and the power; <S%H5808><s%> they shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> they shall not <S%H1077><s%> rise: <S%H6965><s%> they are extinct, <S%H1846><s%> they are quenched <S%H3518><s%> as tow. <S%H6594><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye not <S%H408><s%> the former things, <S%H7223><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> the things of old. <S%H6931><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> a new thing; <S%H2319><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> it shall spring forth; <S%H6779><s%> shall ye not <S%H3808><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> it? I will even <S%H637><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert. <S%H3452><s%>

The beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall honor <S%H3513><s%> me, the dragons <S%H8565><s%> and the owls: <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I give <S%H5414><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and rivers <S%H5104><s%> in the desert, <S%H3452><s%> to give drink <S%H8248><s%> to my people, <S%H5971><s%> my chosen. <S%H972><s%>
This <S%H2098><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have I formed <S%H3335><s%> for myself; they shall show forth <S%H5608><s%> my praise. <S%H8416><s%>
But thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> called upon <S%H7121><s%> me, O Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> thou hast been weary <S%H3021><s%> of me, O Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thou hast not <S%H3808><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> me the small cattle <S%H7716><s%> of thy burnt offerings; <S%H5930><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hast thou honored <S%H3513><s%> me with thy sacrifices. <S%H2077><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> caused thee to serve <S%H5647><s%> with an offering, <S%H4503><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> wearied <S%H3021><s%> thee with incense. <S%H3828><s%>

Thou hast bought <S%H7069><s%> me no <S%H3808><s%> sweet cane <S%H7070><s%> with money, <S%H3701><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hast thou filled <S%H7301><s%> me with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of thy sacrifices: <S%H2077><s%> but <S%H389><s%> thou hast made me to serve <S%H5647><s%> with thy sins, <S%H2403><s%> thou hast wearied <S%H3021><s%> me with thine iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>

I, <S%H595><s%> even I, <S%H595><s%> am he <S%H1931><s%> that blotteth out <S%H4229><s%> thy transgressions <S%H6588><s%> for mine own sake, <S%H4616><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> thy sins. <S%H2403><s%>
Put me in remembrance: <S%H2142><s%> let us plead <S%H8199><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest be justified. <S%H6663><s%>
Thy first <S%H7223><s%> father <S%H1><s%> hath sinned, <S%H2398><s%> and thy teachers <S%H3887><s%> have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me.

Therefore I have profaned <S%H2490><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and have given <S%H5414><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> to the curse, <S%H2764><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> to reproaches. <S%H1421><s%>
